data.name: Rune Factory 5 - Rune Factory Outfits: Raguna and Mist
data.detailed_description:
Dress up your character as Raguna or Mist from Rune Factory.

"Mist's Outfit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Raguna's Outfit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.
data.about_the_game:
Dress up your character as Raguna or Mist from Rune Factory.

"Mist's Outfit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Raguna's Outfit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.
data.short_description: This content requires the base game Rune Factory 5 on Steam in order to play.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
